#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

8.4. Operator Precedence</H1
><P
><A
NAME="OPPRECEDENCE1"
></A
></P
><P
>        In a script, operations execute in order of
        <I
CLASS="FIRSTTERM"
>precedence</I
>: the higher precedence operations
	execute <EM
>before</EM
> the lower precedence ones.
	  <A
NAME="AEN4262"
HREF="#FTN.AEN4262"
><SPAN
CLASS="footnote"
>[1]</SPAN
></A
>
      </P
